sources.title: Un uomo dalla pelle dura (1972)
sources.description: Boxer Teddy Wilcox leaves his manager and relocates. He finds Nick, a  manager/trainer. Before Wilcox's first fight, Nick receives a threat-- Wilcox  loses, or Nick will die. Watch on RetroFlix:  https://retroflix.org/un-uomo-dalla-pelle-dura-1972/
